introduction: The last weekend《终极假日》《终极假日》是一部三集心理惊悚片，2012年由嘉年华电影公司制作，独立电视台（ITV）播出。该片由Blake Morrison的同名小说改编而成。故事发生在东安格利亚一个漫长的周末，该片讲述了一对竞争对手的友谊，随着情节发展，个人情感迫使双方重新评估他们对彼此的看法，从而造成了无法控制的局面。The Last Weekend is a three-part psychological thriller television series produced by Carnival Films in 2012 for ITV, based on the Blake Morrison’s novel of the same name. Set over a long weekend in East Anglia, the story centers on a rival friendship that spirals out of control as personal revelations force each character to reassess their views of one another.伊恩（Shaun Evans饰）和他的妻子艾玛（Claire Keelan饰）收到一个老朋友—奥利（Rupert Penry-Jones饰）的意外邀请，请他们到萨福克郡的乡间与他和他的妻子黛西（Genevieve O'Reilly饰）一起度过周末。四人本期待一个田园诗般的度假，但两个男人的竞争很快就上升到表面，并引发了不可逆转的后果。Ian (Shaun Evans) and Em (Claire Keelan) receive a surprise invitation from an old friend. Ollie (Rupert Penry-Jones) invites the couple to spend a weekend in the Suffolk countryside with him and Daisy (Genevieve O'Reilly). The couples expect an idyllic holiday, but the competitive edge to the men's relationship soon rises to the surface, with irreversible consequences.--松鼠字幕组 橙子 译
